hello.definition:
used as a greeting or to begin a phone 
conversation

goodnight.definition:
expressing good wishes on parting at night or 
before going to bed

car.definition:
a fourwheeled road vehicle that is powered by an 
engine and is able to carry a small number 
of people
car.similar:
Similar Words:
auto, automóvil, carro, vagón, máquina

read.definition:
look at and comprehend the meaning of (written 
or printed matter) by mentally interpreting the 
characters or symbols of which it is 
composed
read.similar:
Similar Words:
decir, consultar, interpretar, descifrar, rezar, indicar, marcar, cursar, lograr leer, 
estudiar, poner, parecer

brother.definition:
a man or boy in relation to other sons and 
daughters of his parents
brother.similar:
Similar Words:
compañero, cofrade, colega, camarada

small.definition: of a size that is less than normal or usual
small.similar:
Similar Words:
menor, bajo, escaso, chico, insignificante, estrecho, menudo, humilde, morroñoso

birthday.definition:
the anniversary of the day on which a person was 
born, typically treated as an occasion for 
celebration and the giving of gifts

talk.definition:
speak in order to give information or express 
ideas or feelings; converse or communicate by 
spoken words
talk.similar:
Similar Words:
conversar, charlar, platicar, seguir hablando, hablar mucho, chismear, 
no parar de hablar, no cesar de hablar

skinny.definition:
(of a person or part of their body) 
unattractively or unusually thin
skinny.similar:
Similar Words:
enjuto, magro, escuchimizado, trasijado, consumido

twenty.definition:
the number equivalent to the product of two and 
ten; ten less than thirty; 20

nine.definition:
equivalent to the product of three and three; 
one more than eight, or one less than ten; 9

Similar Words:

twelve.definition:
equivalent to the product of three and four; two 
more than ten; 12

sixteen.definition:
equivalent to the product of four and four; one 
more than fifteen, or six more than ten; 16

sister.definition:
a woman or girl in relation to other daughters 
and sons of her parents
